about_the_game:
Sculpture of Chance is a roguelike deckbuilding adventure where you hack, modify and tinker with a mysterious slot machine. Assemble your symbols, grab your tools and embark on an ecstatic journey. Crank that lever and give it a spin!

Deckbuilding



Delve into a rich variety of deep strategies and build the ultimate deck from 100+ symbols. Add, swap and upgrade your symbols as you keep spinning those reels. When you get a combination, you will be rewarded with coins, tools, trinkets, or even more symbols. Symbols symbols symbols! There are cute fruit buddies, advanced machineries, friendly monsters, delicious hot dogs, pizza, tiramisu I'm getting distracted, but you get the point: Symbols!

Tools



Make every spin count! A little handy work never hurt no one: If you're unhappy with the results, grab a crank and readjust the reel. Need an additional payline? Use your pen and draw it in. Supercharge your symbols with batteries, find hidden keys to unlock treasure chests and use powerful weapons to kill evil foes. Mastery of your tools is essential if you want to build the most magnificent Sculpture of Chance!

Stages



Explore lush forests, ancient caverns and futuristic mega cities! Nuclear wastelands, a pompous castle, a secret lab! A tower high in the clouds, a dome deep under the sea, alien planets! Along the way, you will meet mysterious strangers, make new friends and fight intimidating monsters. If you ask me, that sounds like a blast! So, what are you waiting for? Embark on your quest to succumb yourself to the will of chance build the most magnificent Sculpture of Chance!
